DOC.detailed_description: This open-label ( people know identity intervention ) , multicenter study genotype 1 chronic HCV infect liver transplant patient treat 12 week telaprevir 750 mg every 8 hour give combination Peg-IFN-alfa-2a ribavirin follow 36 week treatment Peg-IFN-alfa-2a ribavirin alone .
